problem_text_cn: 如图,扇形的半径为6,圆心角θ为120°,用这个扇形围成一个圆锥的侧面,所得圆锥的高为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of the sector is N_0, and the central angle θ is N_1. Use this sector to enclose the side of a cone, and the height of the cone obtained is ()
raw_answer: 解:扇形的弧长=\frac{120π×6}{180}=4π,圆锥的底面半径为4π÷2π=2,故圆锥的高为:√{6^{2}-2^{2}}=4．故选:A．
